snippet: The Florida senator disputes assertions by the president of Venezuela in an Op-Ed essay.
abstract: Letter from Sen Marco Rubio responds to April 2 Op-Ed article by Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro contending that foreign news coverage of country's protests has distorted facts.
lead_paragraph: The Florida senator disputes assertions by the president of Venezuela in an Op-Ed essay.

headline.main: The Truth About Venezuela, as Marco Rubio Sees It
headline.print_headline: The Truth About Venezuela, as Marco Rubio Sees It
